text: Tiara Tahiti is a 1962 British comedy-drama movie directed by first time director Ted Kotcheff and based on the novel by Geoffrey Cotterell. It stars John Mills, James Mason, Herbert Lom, Rosenda Monteros, Claude Dauphin, Roy Kinnear. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 comedy-drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Movies set in French Polynesia
title: Tiara Tahiti
